dcterms:description: The Global Terrorism Database (GTD) is the worldâ€™s most comprehensive and detailed open-access dataset on terrorist events, including data on more than 200,000 real-world events. It includes information on the intention, violence, and sub-national nature of terrorist actors, along with various characteristics of each event.
dcterms:title: Global Terrorism Database (GTD)

dcterms:creator: G. LaFree
L. Dugan
dcterms:description: The Afghanistan Dataset includes data on terrorist attacks that occurred in Afghanistan from 2001 to 2018, focusing on the operational characteristics of these events.
dcterms:title: Afghanistan Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. LaFree
L. Dugan
dcterms:description: The Iraq Dataset includes data on terrorist attacks that occurred in Iraq from 2001 to 2018, focusing on the operational characteristics of these events.
dcterms:title: Iraq Dataset
